entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
